metadata.description: Yam and his fun-loving friends live on the remote tropical island of Leche de la Luna, and are always getting mixed up in surreal adventures, whether it's encountering cupcakes that spring to life, befriending potted flowers, or exploring the mysterious ruins on the island. Yam develops a crush on a girl much too old for him, but ends up being able to communicate with her in his dreams. The "silent," all-ages graphic novel also contains a full-color section and several short stories which have seen print in Nickelodeon Magazine.
metadata.name: Yam
